suggested values:

𓌷 𓂝 𓏜 •maaty : true
𓃀 𓂝 𓂝 𓏜 boast, boasting

𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | deed, event, affair, pastime | sym𓏜 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | deed | ғәмәл ğəməl gnìomh 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | deed | מעשה ma'ase ≈ make 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | event | შემთხვევა šemtxveva ! 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | event | συμβάν συμβαν symvan ≈ sym-venture ≈ sym'ter 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | affair | •séma ≈ θέμα théma 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | affair | ζήτημα zítima ≈ 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | affair | •śymthéma / symtum ≠ symptom ( πίπτω píptō “fall” ) 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | pastime | <> سرگرمی sargarmi 𓋴 𓅓 𓏜 | pastime | <> tempo tiempo <> time timo(deed)

Dictum 𓂧 𓏏 𓏜 ditum madita :
